titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5724) to implement the United States-Colombia Trade Promotion Agreement.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5724) to implement the United States-Colombia Trade Promotion Agreement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5724) to implement the United States-Colombia Trade Promotion Agreement.
